_header: Harken to my tale that I shall to you shew

NLS1931.First Lines:
Herkyn to my tale þat I schall to yow schewfor of seche
                    meruels haue ye hard bot few…
NLS1931.Last Lines:
…God as he made hus mend hus he meySaue hus and sende hus sum
                    drynke for þis dey
NLS1931.Note:
49 lines; nineteenth-century transcript in London,  British Library Egerton 2257, ff.
                    169-170.
NLS1931.Attributed Author:
Secundum Recardum Heegge quod ipse fuit ad istud conviuium & non
                        habuit potacionem

Hardman,  Phillipa.

            2000.

Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.
